mapper.select: SELECT dalf.`id` AS archivesFileId, dalf.`create_time`, dalf.`original_name` AS archivesFileOriginalName, dalf.`context` AS archivesFileContext, dalf.`archives_library_id` AS archivesLibId, dalf.`data_id` AS archivesDirectoryId FROM data_archives_library_file AS dalf WHERE MATCH(dalf.`original_name`, `context`) AGAINST(CONCAT('*', #{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE) ORDER BY create_time
